com.hortonworks.registries.schemaregistry.examples.avro

Class KafkaAvroSerDesApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hortonworks.registries.schemaregistry.examples.avro.KafkaAvroSerDesApp

  • public class KafkaAvroSerDesApp
extends Object
    Below class can be used to send messages to a given topic in kafka-producer.props like below. KafkaAvroSerDesApp -sm -d yelp_review_json -s yelp_review.avsc -p kafka-producer.props
